title: sync breaks with error get: neon: 1, errno 10013
body:
owncloud version: 4.5.6 host os: windows server 2008 r2 client os: win7 sync client version: 1.2.0 description: when trying to synchronize a 310 mb large file from the server to the client the sync consistently breaks at about 200 mb. the sync restarts and consequently breaks at the same file again client log output: 01-27 14:34:43:564 oc_module: neon error code was 1 01-27 14:34:43:564 oc_module: error get: neon: 1, errno 10013 01-27 14:34:43:564 virtual void mirall::watcherthread::run() change detected in "f:/006_b.i.m.m_owncloud\00000_b.i.m.m_cloud" from mirall::watcherthread(0x1e87400) 01-27 14:34:43:564 _csync_push_file: file: owncloud://83.175.118.6/owncloud/remote.php/webdav/shared/00000_b.i.m.m_cloud/b.i.m.m_000_install/90_revit_goodies/2012-06-30_plugin_sofistik/sofistik_bimtools_r2012/sofistik_2012_small.exe, command: sendfile, error: unknown error from errno 10013 01-27 14:34:43:564 folderwatcher::changedetected when eventsenabled() -> ignore 01-27 14:34:43:611 virtual void mirall::watcherthread::run() change detected in "f:/006_b.i.m.m_owncloud\00000_b.i.m.m_cloud" from mirall::watcherthread(0x1e87400) 01-27 14:34:43:611 folderwatcher::changedetected when eventsenabled() -> ignore 01-27 14:34:43:611 _csync_propagation_file_visitor: fail new: b.i.m.m_000_install/90_revit_goodies/2012-06-30_plugin_sofistik/sofistik_bimtools_r2012/sofistik_2012_small.exe 01-27 14:34:43:611 csync_propagate: propagation for remote replica took 676.34 seconds visiting 1170 files. 01-27 14:34:43:611 #### error csync_propagate: "csync processing step propagate failed.
backend message: could not read response body: connection timed out" 01-27 14:34:43:611 virtual void mirall::watcherthread::run() change detected in "f:/006_b.i.m.m_owncloud\00000_b.i.m.m_cloud" from mirall::watcherthread(0x1e87400) 01-27 14:34:43:611 csync run took 738630 milliseconds 01-27 14:34:43:626 folderwatcher::changedetected when eventsenabled() -> ignore 01-27 14:34:43:626 -> csync finished slot with error true 01-27 14:34:43:626 ** error strings: ("csync processing step propagate failed.
backend message: could not read response body: connection timed out") 01-27 14:34:43:626 * owncloud csync thread finished with error 01-27 14:34:43:626 starting event logging again in 2000 milliseconds server owncloud log: {"app":"files_sharing","message":"file source not found for: \/_gsdata_","level":3,"time":1359292241} {"app":"files_sharing","message":"file source not found for:
